other_tests.findings: Total serum IgE level was 5000 IU/ml (normal value 0–100 IU/ml); Phadiatop and fx5E were negative.
White blood cell count was 10.34/ml with 73% granulocytes and 5.4% eosinophils. Immunoglobulin M level was slightly low at 0.535 g/l; CD3 was low at 55.1% and CD8 was low at 19.3%.
Chest radiograph showed pneumonia; review was normal after treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Chest X-ray review was normal after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Candida albicans was identified from culture of pseudo-membranous plaques.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 1 week, oral leukoplakia symptoms disappeared and fungal examination was negative.

other_tests.findings: Low bone mineral density (BMD 756 mg/cm³; T-3.0, Z-1.3) indicating osteoporosis.
Bottled camel milk produced 8-mm induration and 30-mm erythema.
